column5: Wow! This is some perch.  http://www.anglerstimes.co.uk/perch.htm
Wow.  That's a beauty.  Its amazing how so many big fish in the UK are still caught with good old maggots.  I wish I could catch a perch half that size!  007
thats one big mama of a perch.
That's one honkin' perch-does anyone know the species?  (It's not "our" yellow perch is it?)
Big perch, alright...  I read the article too, interesting to learn a little about the techniques they use in the UK.  Mike
Love the perch,,,would love even more to catch the walleye that could eat that perch.
WOW.....THATS THE BIGGEST PERCH I HAVE EVER SEEN  ,IS IT POSSIBLE IT COULD BE A WORLD RECORD TOO ?????     cheers
It's awesome how orange the fins are, it's also my favorite color on jigs and baits even in crystal clear water it seems to work on every species.
Holy beep~!  I wish I could catch that~!  Just imagine every single perch we caught in Ontario are at least half its size; then Ontario's anglers average weight will for sure increase alot.
kinda looks like a peakcock bass
